name: midiplayer
description: Plays midis by rapidly loading and clearing pitched component bricks
author: Lythine

authorized.description: If defined, commands will be locked and only usable by the specified user(s).

loop.description: If the song loops or not.

autoplaySong.description: If defined, this song will automatically play when this plugin is loaded.

noteVisibility.description: If the notes are visible or not.

cooldownTime.description: Cooldown time between slash commands in ms.

positionOffset.description: Offsets the position that the music bricks spawn by an X, Y, and Z value.

commands.name: /midi-load
commands.description: Loads a midi and then plays it. See `/midi-list`.

args.name: Song Name
args.description: The name of the song you want to load. Case sensitive!

commands.name: /midi-np
commands.description: Shows the progress and length of the currently loaded song.

commands.name: /midi-volume
commands.description: Changes the volume of the song by a positive integer.

args.name: Volume
args.description: The volume to set the music to.
